definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: In China, the Chinese enterprises are faced with the foreign brands catering enterprises to squeeze.
sentences.chinese: 在國內，中餐企業面臨着外國品牌餐飲企業的擠壓。

sentences.english: I think Chinese food is perfect in color, aroma and taste.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得中餐菜真是色香味俱佳。

sentences.english: At a Chinese party the guests usually arrive 5-10 minutes early.
sentences.chinese: 中餐宴會客人凡是提前五至非常鍾到達。

sentences.english: One Day Batam City Shopping Tour with One Seafood Lunch as per itinerary.
sentences.chinese: 一天的巴淡島購物遊和一個海鮮中餐。

sentences.english: American Chinese food tends to be cooked very quickly with a great deal of oil and salt.
sentences.chinese: 美國中餐往往是非常快煮熟了大量油和鹽。

sentences.english: We have Chinese restaurant and a western-style restaurant. Which one do you prefer?
sentences.chinese: 我們有中餐廳和西餐廳，你願意赴什麼？

sentences.english: A hotdog when she came for lunch, Chinese if she stayed for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 午餐喫熱狗，如果能呆到晚餐時間那就喫中餐。

sentences.english: Most Chinese restaurants in New Zealand feature Cantonese cuisineadapted to Western tastes.
sentences.chinese: 新西蘭大多數中餐館都是適合西方人口味的廣東菜。

sentences.english: We serve very good Chinese food.
Isabella Bella: If this ends badly being that I become the meal.
sentences.chinese: 最壞的結局就是我變爲盤中餐吧。

sentences.english: We have Yangzhou fried rice in Chinese restaurants back in the U. K.
sentences.chinese: 在英國的中餐館裏，我們就有揚州炒飯。

sentences.english: Best Chinese Seafood & Hotpot restaurant in New Saigon City Centre Phu My Hung area.
sentences.chinese: 胡志明市新城區富美興最好的中餐海鮮火鍋酒家。

sentences.english: Who knows the dishes food, each grain is hard.
sentences.chinese: 誰知盤中餐，粒粒皆辛苦。

sentences.english: Uniform for western restaurant is bright-colored and for Chinese restaurant is classical.
sentences.chinese: 西餐廳的服裝活潑亮麗，中餐廳的婉約古典。

sentences.english: The second phase of the Hotel's construction will witness the establishment of larger Chinese Restaurant and fitness center.
sentences.chinese: 在酒店發展第二期更加配大型的中餐廳及康體中心。

definition: dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
